description: Ensure a subtask exists under a Jira issue

parent_issue.description: The Jira issue under which to create the subtask

jira_username.description: Jira API username (probably an email address)

jira_token.description:
Jira API token 
  _NOTES_
  - You MUST generate an API token (basic auth no longer works). 
  - To do so, you must have Jira instance access rights. 
  - You can generate a token here: https://id.atlassian.com/manage/api-tokens

extra_gem_path.description: Additional gem paths to look for ruby gems (e.g., `jira-ruby`)
